allOf.title: ModuleConfiguration
allOf.description:
Defines a "DevEx Module" that is a Helix-like module that can contain serialized item configurations, etc.
This class is overridden with Serialization-specific derived versions that provide access to their module-specific settings.

namespace.description:
The namespace of the module. All resources in the module inherit this namespace.
Namespaces can contain letters, numbers, dots (.), and hyphens (-).

description.description: Description of the module, for reference/docs purposes only

references.description: Names of other modules that are referenced by resources in this module. Wildcards are allowed, i.e. Foundation.*.

source.description: Generic identifier as to where the module came from. Used internally for error messaging. Do not set in a module file; it will be ignored.
